docblock.description: Sort retrieved posts by parameter. Defaults to 'date'.

Order by Page Order. Used most often for Pages (Order field in the Edit Page Attributes box) and for Attachments (the integer fields in the Insert / Upload Media Gallery dialog), but could be used for any post type with distinct 'menu_order' values (they all default to 0).
Note that a 'meta_key=keyname' must also be present in the query.
docblock.long-description: Note also that the sorting will be alphabetical which is fine for strings (i.e. words), but can be unexpected for numbers (e.g. 1, 3, 34, 4, 56, 6, etc, rather than 1, 3, 4, 6, 34, 56 as you might naturally expect). Use 'meta_value_num' instead for numeric values.

docblock.description: Order by numeric meta value (available with Version 2.8).
